meka karala thiyenne blog wala inna kenekmada kiyanna danne naha..eeth pothgullata labuna mel eke hatiyata meka koman hak kirimakdo kiyala hithenawa..kohoma wunath me gana danum therum athi aya nelum wilata goda wadila adahas dakwimak kaloth eeka hamotama prayojanawath weyi.
owun me widiyata kata aadhara dunnath, ehema karanne sadbhawayen neweyi.
aaksha wanigasuriya, me nama wagema ayath harima rumath.
ada kohedi hari thun weni kotase link eka labuna.
galaboda charikawen passe thawath than gananawakama awiddath ee atharin suwisheshi wu alagalla kandu tharanaya gana thamayi ada mama liyanna sudanam wenne.me charikawe wishe...

rel gettu nathiwa minissu marenawa.
man kude aran yanna kiyala wande nathi tika witharayi.
bada ginne inna ayata kama nodi wenath dewal dila wadak na.

janadhipathi maithripala sirisena, okthobar 26 weni dina agamathi ranil wikramasinha padawiyen pahakota mahinda rajapaksha nawa agamathiwaraya lesin path kirimath samaga rate mathu wi thibena "awul sahagatha deshapalana wathawaranaya" sambandhayen janadhipathiwaraya saha kathanayakawaraya sakachcha kota kadinam wisandumakata elambaiya yuthu bawa brahaspathinda parlimenthuwedi manthriwaru penwa dunha.
- aadaraya athule anuragaya thiyenawa.
kohomada ehema kale?
eeka haduwe rodath karakena widihata.
juli 19 wanada rajayata wiruddha hamuda karalla nila washayen prakashayata path kale jenaral emiliyo mola ya.
his mola nothibunema gnyanasara himita ha madhumadhawata bawa siduwu maha khedayen pene.
namuth awabodhayen yukthawa wiruddha mathadhari deshapalana adahas darana wiwahakayan ape rateth sahenna innawa.
hisdeyin pamanak sangraha karayi.

skribfayar kiyana me mrudukangaya aththatama ward pawarpoyint hadana sotweyara wage maha wisala ganaka dharithawen yuktha ekak nam neme..me mrudukangaya thiyenne fayarfoks,krom,opera wage web brawsara samaga ena amathara ekathukirimak widiyata..fayar foks walanam ad on ekak widiyata thama meka enne kroma walath ee widiyema amathara ekathukaraganme sandaha athi kuda kotasak thamayi me skribfayar kiyanne....me kiyana mrudukangaya me web adawiyen gena pahasuwen ma ekathukaraganna puluwani..ee sandaha me web adawiya wiwidhakarayen magapenwi m karala thiyenawa...fayarfoks web brawsaraya sandaha ef8 kiyana boththama ebu witath kromiyam sandahath ewanima hot ki harahath me aplikeshan ekath ekka ekathuwenna puluwani..kromiyam sandaha athi me wadasatahana eka tab ekak matha pamanak kriya karana nisa wenath wadaka niratha wena gamanma blog liyannata edit karannata meyin apita hakiyawa pawathinawa..web adawiyata ad oon nathnam ekathukirim thiyena thanata gihin me ingiris namin sewimak kalath me suti mrudukanga kalla pennum karanawa...hadisiye apita wena wadak yedunoth blogin maga dala dongal eka hari sambandhitha wenath kotasa galawaladala lap eka aran duwanna puluwan me ad on eka thiyenawanam..mokada hama deyakma pablish karanakal randenne kompithare athule nisa...mama kalin waruwak hoyala mrudukangayak ekathu karagaththa blog liyanna eeth eeka antharjalayata niwaradiwa kanekt wenne nathi pasnayak aawa ee wenakota mama skribfayar gana danahitiyath man hithuwe na me tharan lassana athuru munathak skribfayar wala athi kiyala....ithin mata gugal bas ekedith yaluwek kiwwa ooflayin blog edit karanna me aplikeshan eka wadagath kiyala ..ethumatath sthuthiy kiyanawa aa...me thiyenne me ad on eka dagaththu fayarfoks brawsarayaka blog liyana awasthawaka gaththa jayarupayak....
